ygData.subject: Water Crystal Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: This staff does NOT look like an ice cream cone like the orbs do... Seeing as I have one I can tell you exactly what it looks like. In your weapon slot it
ygData.messageBody:
This staff does NOT look like an ice cream cone like the orbs do... Seeing as I have one I can tell you exactly what it looks like. In your weapon slot
it looks exactly like a glowing crook but on your character when you equip it it looks like a staff with a crsytal on the top the crystal is white and in
the shape of a pyramid sort of. If anything this staff is for looks only not really worth 300 plat or whatever.
Niuban Great Wizard of Innoruuk
Bertoxx Server
